DOC.brief_summary: Cross-sectional evaluation of hydration status and kidney function in patients with pulmonary hypertension
DOC.brief_title: Hydration Status and Kidney Disease in Patients With Pulmonary Hypertension
DOC.detailed_description: This cross-sectional study is designed to evaluate the hydration and nutritional status and kidney function in patients with pulmonary hypertension at outpatient clinic via bioimpedance and urine analysis.
DOC.criteria: Older than 18 years Patients refusing to participate Deterioration of the patients` clinical condition independent of origin
